mapper.update: update tbl_board set readcnt = readcnt + 1 where board_num = #{board_num}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board (board_num, root, board_title, board_content, board_writer, filename, filepath, subcode ) values (seq_board_num.nextval, seq_board_num.currval, #{board_title}, #{board_content}, #{board_writer}, #{filename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filepath, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 1 )

sql.if: where board_writer in (select id from user_member where name like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' )
where board_title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or board_content like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or board_writer in (select id from user_member where name like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' )

mapper.select: select * from (select rownum no, n.*, (select name from user_member where user_member.id = board_writer) name from (select * from tbl_board order by root, step desc) n order by no desc) where subcode = '1 ' and no between #{beginList} and #{endList}
